alert.note: Alert for Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 20 at 11:08AM MDT until March 21 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches at Whitebird Hill, Whitebird Grade, Tolo Lake and areas south of Grangeville, 5 to 10 inches on the ridges near Pollock to Lucile. Lower elevations along US-95 may experience periodic slush overnight. * WHERE...Lower Hells Canyon/Salmon River Region. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 5 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region
